thread.title: Video of Ailin Perez spicy dance with Merab Dvalishvili leaves UFC fans speechless | Marca
thread.title_full: Video of Ailin Perez spicy dance with Merab Dvalishvili leaves UFC fans speechless | Marca

author: Parker Johnson
title: Video of Ailin Perez spicy dance with Merab Dvalishvili leaves UFC fans speechless | Marca
text:
UFC 306 was full of drama, but it wasn't until after Merab Dvalishvili took down Sean O'Malley inside Sphere Las Vegas that the wildest moment of all took place. MMA fans could not believe their eyes when they saw this video of a shirtless Merab dancing with Ailin Perez , the controversial UFC fighter and OnlyFans model.
Ailin Perez: the UFC fighter with an OnlyFans Perez has made a name for herself by twerking in the Octagon , a controversial behavior that earned her plenty of criticism from the UFC community , but also gave her an opportunity to capitalize by creating her own OnlyFans account .
She posted the video on Instagram to her 470,000 followers , where it fit in among many other confident videos showing her dancing ability. Perez's caption read: "congratulations champion now you really won the PRIZE."
"So this is how merab gets his powers," joked one comment, while Dvalishvili himself simply joined the replies with a laughing emoji.
Merab had plenty to celebrate Merab is clearly a fan of Perez's trademark moves, which he got to experience first hand in the viral video . He got so caught up in the moment that he tore his shirt off and even asked, "Can I touch it?" to the amazement of UFC fans.
Ver esta publicaci√≥n en Instagram The Machine from Georgia is keeping the good vibes rolling on the back of his massive victory in UFC 306.
